description: Registration service requires the User schema.
Registration E2E tests validate the service implementation.
impact_if_delayed: Blocks validation of the registration feature.

description: The global JWT guard must use the TokenBlocklistService to check for invalidated tokens.
mitigation_plan: Ensure service interface is stable and well-tested.

description: E2E test for logout validates the entire JWT guard and blocklist implementation.
mitigation_plan: Close collaboration between backend and QA.
impact_if_delayed: Blocks final validation of the logout feature.

description: The email verification story (US-003) depends on the email sending mechanism being implemented.
mitigation_plan: Use a mock event listener for parallel development of the verification logic.
impact_if_delayed: Delays the completion of the user activation flow.
